---
title: "Income VS Degree"
execute: 
  echo: false
---


```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(lubridate)
  library(dplyr)
})

data <- read_csv("adult.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)

```
```{r}
data <- data |>
    rename(income = `<=50K`)
ggplot(data, aes(x = Bachelors, fill = income)) +
    geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
    scale_x_discrete(guide = guide_axis(check.overlap = TRUE))+
    labs(title = "Income Levels by Education",
         x = "Education Level",
         y = "Count")
```
